input.activity_signal: Multiple strong signals: Active website found at apeiron.io describing current platform services, LinkedIn company page showing VoIP/SMS products, FCC Form 499 filing from April 2023 indicating active interconnected VoIP services and USF contributions, subsidiary relationship with KonaTel Inc as of December 2018
input.product_summary: Apeiron provides a communications platform delivering VoIP, SMS, WebRTC and messaging services to businesses through pay-per-use APIs and GUI interfaces, positioned as a Communications Platform as a Service (CPaaS) provider.
